article.class: et_pb_post clearfix post-8566 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-district category-featured category-hs category-news

img.alt: Berlin CSD Senior Allison Ryder Teams Up With Her Family To Help Others

h2.a: Berlin CSD Senior Allison Ryder Teams Up With Her Family To Help Others

article.p: Apr 19, 2020 | District, Featured, High School, News

div.p: Like many of us, Allison is at home, not knowing when life will go back to what it was, due to coronavirus precautions. When Allison is not busy with her school work she is helping her mother sew, and to date they have sewn over 300 masks and about 50 pieces of headwear to use with N95 respirator masks for nursing home and daycare providers.

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix post-8563 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-district category-es category-hs category-ms category-news

img.alt: Frozen food to be distributed in New Lebanon

h2.a: Frozen food to be distributed in New Lebanon

article.p: Apr 17, 2020 | District, Elementary School, High School, Middle School, News

div.p: The Regional Food Bank of NENY has donated frozen food to the New Lebanon CSD, and they have graciously offered to partner with Berlin CSD to distribute.

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix post-8545 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-district category-featured category-hs category-news

img.alt: Class of 2020’s “Top Ten With A Twist”

h2.a: Class of 2020’s “Top Ten With A Twist”

article.p: Apr 17, 2020 | District, Featured, High School, News

div.p: On April 16, the Berlin Central School District Class of 2020 arrived at the Berlin Middle-High School parking for the announcement of the “Top 10” with a twist. To maintain social distance, students and families backed into specially marked senior parking spots with signs for the seniors and families. These were a gift from Berlin CSD and a way for families to highlight their extraordinary seniors from home.

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix post-8390 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-district category-es category-featured category-hs category-ms category-news
article.p: Apr 16, 2020 | District, Elementary School, Featured, High School, Middle School, News

div.p: While classes are cancelled and offices are closed due to coronavirus precautions, we are listing important information and resources for families on this page

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_no_thumb post-8519 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-athletics category-district category-es category-featured category-hs category-ms category-news

h2.a: BCSD Will “Virtually” Race 1 Mile Fun Run and 5K

article.p: Apr 13, 2020 | Athletics, District, Elementary School, Featured, High School, Middle School, News

div.p: Due to the coronavirus precautionary measures the Annual Berlin 1 Mile Fun Run and 5K scheduled for May 2, has been cancelled. However, we want to encourage the BCSD community to get out and get moving so we are converting the 1 Mile Fun Run and 5K to a Virtual Race.

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_no_thumb post-8494 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-district category-featured category-hs category-news

div.p: Seniors please take time to check out the scholarship opportunities that are still taking applications.
